column3: $Lewis tagged up, planning to score after catch, but Valentin, runner on 2nd, thought ball would hit the wall and took off, hoping to score; the ball was caught and Valentin was out for passing Lewis to complete DP

ej,wrigj002,P,koscg901,Intentional HBP ej,lewid001,P,koscg901,Fight after HBP $Darren Lewis stood at HP and yelled at Jaret Wright, who challenged Lewis; both benches emptied and punches were thrown; Lewis and Wright were ejected by HP umpire Greg Kosc

ej,cormr001,P,koscg901,Intentional HBP ej,thomj002,P,koscg901,Fight after HBP $Rheal Cormier's pitch hit Jim Thome in the ribs; both benches cleared and Red Sox catcher Jason Varitek tackled David Justice; Cormier and Thome were ejected by HP umpire Greg Kosc
ej,mcdoj001,P,shulj901,Call at 3B (Runner left too early) Jack McDowell ejected by 3B umpire John Shulock from bench; McDowell was on the disabled list at the time
ej,willj107,M,fostm901,Balls and strikes $Red Sox manager Williams ejected by HP umpire Foster for arguing balls and strikes wit Valentin at bat

ej,andem002,P,meric901,Intentional HBP ej,ausmb001,P,meric901,Arguing teammate's ejection ej,parrl002,M,meric901,Arguing player's ejection $Pitcher Anderson ejected by HP umpire Meriwether for intentional HBP; Tigers Ausmus and manager Parrish ejected by Meriwether for arguing Anderson's ejection
ej,pinil001,M,merrd901,Call at HP ej,smits801,C,roe-r901,Call at HP $Mariners manager Piniella ejected by HP umpire Merrill and Mariners coach Smith ejected by 2B umpire Roe for arguing same call
